long_description: The REI Belltown Wristlet provides grab-and-go convenience-it carries your cards, currency, coins and even your phone. Zippered design provides secure closure to prevent contents from spilling out. Gusseted opening contains card slots, a zippered coin pocket and larger slots for currency; you can even stow your phone inside. Short strap converts from wristlet style to purse style. Polyester (80% recycled) fabric holds up to urban elements.
short_description: The REI Belltown Wristlet provides grab-and-go convenience-it carries your cards, currency, coins and even your phone.
